tutorial.txt.content:
Welcome to env0.terminal!

== Basic Navigation ==
- 'ls' — list files in the current directory.
- 'cd [dir]' — change directory.
- 'cat [file]' — print file contents.
- 'read [file]' — read large files, one screen at a time.
- 'pwd' — show current directory.
- 'clear' — clear the terminal.

== Advanced ==
- 'help' — view command list.
- Use Tab to autocomplete (if supported).
- Use up/down to recall previous commands (if supported).

== File Types ==
- .txt — text files (documents, notes)
- .log — logs (system info, error trails)
- .bin — binary (try to cat them!)
- .sh — scripts (for later!)

== Pro Tips ==
- Explore /etc, /log, /system, and /secrets for lore, secrets, and clues.
- Some files are corrupted or encrypted. Not everything can be read by normal means.
- Try 'cat ghosts.txt' if you find it...

== Escape Hatches ==
- Type 'exit' to leave SSH sessions.
- If stuck in login, try 'abort'.

== The SBC is not what it seems ==
Some files resist reading. Some logs change when you aren't looking. Good luck.

filesystem_1.txt.content:
Player SBC — Standard Home System
Welcome to the main SBC terminal. Use this for the tutorial and basic navigation.

diary.txt.content:
2025-05-21: Static on the terminal again.
2025-05-22: ghosts.txt wasn't here yesterday.
2025-05-23: /system/deeper/obscura/maze/shadow.log appeared... wtf?

todo.txt.content:
- Finish the tutorial
- Explore /etc and /system
- Try to decode /etc/secret/hidden.hex
- If you find 'mirror', don't trust what you see.

whispers.txt.content:
the static is hungry
your keystrokes echo backwards
01001110 01001111 01010111

manifest.txt.content: I was here first. This is not your home. It never was.

reflection.txt.content:
You look into the mirror. You see... yourself? But the prompt is backwards:
/$ .orez.edon.cbs@resu

motd.txt.content: Welcome to env0 SBC — unauthorized use will be haunted.

network.conf.content:
iface eth0 inet static
address 10.10.10.1
netmask 255.255.255.0
gateway 10.10.10.254

boot.log.content:
Boot successful at 2025-05-23T09:12:00Z
Static lines detected: 2
Unknown device on subnet: 10.10.10.99

error.log.content:
2025-05-22 12:11:08: CRITICAL - /system/crash/core_dump.bin inaccessible
2025-05-22 12:11:10: WARNING - ghosts.txt opened at 03:33am

hauntings.log.content:
03:33 - Terminal glitch. Saw 'ghosts.txt' in /home/ghost/.
03:36 - User reported backwards typing.
03:38 - System returned to normal.

maze.log.content: If you keep going deeper, you only find... more maze.

ghost.txt.content: You see your own actions, but slightly delayed. The terminal feels... off.

ghosts.txt.content:
You opened the file. The temperature drops. Something whispers: 'hello, user.'
Did you hear that?

arcana.txt.content: X marks the haunted directory. /home/ghost/whispers.txt. Some things should not be read aloud.

echo.txt.content:
You shout into the abyss. Something shouts back:
. . .
